sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>5</base_damage> <critical_rating>4</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>A good compromise between concealment and power, light blasters are favored by those who often need a firearmâ€”but just as often need to pretend they don't. Smugglers, spies, and rogues who don't want to advertise their shadier side are all likely to carry light blasters. Smaller-framed species tend to favor light blasters as well, simply for their weight and convenience relative to their own body mass.  Models Include: Merr-Sonn Model 44 Blaster Pistol, BlasTech DL-18 Blaster Pistol.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>2</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Light Blaster Pistol</name> <number>GEAR0001002</number> <price>300</price> <range>medium</range> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Light (Ag)">d290dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a6</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 05:16:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>01d0e4e82fd46450e0f497eef699b63c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 05:23:39</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
